Text: hey how do i open these .cbr files?
Too band they are about a year behind in putting out issue #3.
google cbr to find a free comic book viewer

I would recommend CDisplay EX http://sourceforge.net/projects/cdisplayex

It's great, and it's free (as in beer) and open source.

It's a great tool, buy the comic, put it away somewhere nice and safe and then download  it and read it there. Keeps things in pristine condition, now if only I knew of some good database program to keep track of the physical collection.

This is such an awesome set of two comic books
They actually canceled this project due to scripting problems

Hey due...first of all you are AWESOME for having the Transformers Adaptation comic!! I don't care what your mom says about you, you rule!! J/K...but now to my real question, are you going to put up the ROTF Adaptation comic? And if so, when? No pressure.
